thread.title: Billy Godleman signs new contract with Derbyshire
thread.title_full: Billy Godleman signs new contract with Derbyshire

title: Billy Godleman signs new contract with Derbyshire
text:
Billy Godleman signs new contract with Derbyshire 05 Oct 2015 09:46:57 
comments 
Opening batsman Billy Godleman has committed himself to Derbyshire until the end of the 2017 season. 
The 26-year-old, who was awarded his county cap last month, was Derbyshire's leading run-scorer in the LV= County Championship Division Two this summer with 1,069 at 44.54. 
Godleman, who scored 1,415 runs across all three formats this season, said: "I'm delighted to commit my future to Derbyshire. This summer has been the best year of my career and I'm pleased to have been able to repay the faith the club has shown in me. 
"I want to continue to improve and play a leading role both on and off the field as we push for success." Related Sport News
